questions.question: What is XTRAPOWER?
questions.answer: XTRAPOWER is a Smart Chip Card based highly secure Fleet Management Program for Logistics Service Providers, Commercial Vehicle Owners / Operators & Corporates. You get convenience of Cashless Transactions, Security, Credit, Telematics, Online Fleet Management, MIS Reports and Attractive Loyalty Rewards.

questions.question: Who can become a Member?
questions.answer: If you are a Fleet Owner / Operator, Corporate or any other business entity that owns or controls vehicles for commercial use or manages DG Sets / Stationery Equipment, you can become a member of XTRAPOWER program.

questions.question: I am driving my own Vehicle? Can I become a Member?
questions.answer: If you are a single vehicle owner using your vehicle (Car / Truck) for commercial purposes like movement of people or goods, you are eligible for XTRAPOWER Fleet Program or XTRAPOWER Driver Card Program. However, if you are driving your own personal Car, you can enroll for our XTRAREWARDS loyalty program.

questions.question: I have a fleet of Cars at my office. Can I become a Member?
questions.answer: Yes. You can enroll into the Program if your office owns / operates a fleet of cars for any client.

questions.question: What is the Membership Fee?
questions.answer: Membership Fee is waived off for joining XTRAPOWER Program.

questions.question: How long is the membership valid?
questions.answer: The XTRAPOWER membership is valid perpetually.

questions.question: What are the products that I can buy using XTRAPOWER?
questions.answer: You can buy all the products and services offered by IndianOil at more than 32000 retail outlets across the country. You can buy Petrol, Diesel, DEF, Lubricants or even RFID / Telematics services offered by us.

questions.question: What are the benefits of becoming a member of the XTRAPOWER?
questions.answer: There are several benefits of becoming a XTRAPOWER member. You get Convenience, Control, Cost- savings, Credit, Personal Accident Insurance, Reports, and Loyalty Rewards. To know the full benefits, please visit the link Program.

questions.question: How is XTRAPOWER better than other programs?
questions.answer: XTRAPOWER is better placed than comparable programs in India due to Largest Retail Network, Integrated Platform offering RFID and Telematics, Doorstep Delivery integration, Credit facility through Credit Partners, Custom developments to suit your business needs, Large stack of API Integrations, Reward Points, Instant Fuel Redemption, Insurance benefits, Driver care to list few benefits. There are no charges and hidden fees like some bank cards. To know the full benefits, please visit the link Program.

questions.question: What is EASY FUEL?
questions.answer: XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL is a Smart Card-based Gift Card Program. You can load money into the smart card and gift fuel to your stakeholders for purchasing fuel or lubes at Indian Oil Retail Outlets.

questions.question: What are types of XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL CARD?
questions.answer:
The card comes in two types:
  • Single recharge meant for one time top ups.
    • Use cases: Marketing campaigns, Gift Fuel, One time use cases
  • Multiple recharge meant for repeated top ups.
    • Use cases: Employee reimbursements.
Customers can use cards as long as the value in the card remains without worrying about validity expiry.

questions.question: Who can become a Member?
questions.answer: Any Corporate or any other Business Entity wishing to gift fuel can become a member of XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL CARD program.

questions.question: How do I enroll for XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL CARD?
questions.answer: Enrolment for XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL is very easy. You can register online for enrolment or download an application form from our website and apply or simply call our XTRAPOWER Service Centre or our Fleet Marketing Manager. Upon receiving your application, XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL CARD shall be delivered to you within 10 working days.

questions.question: What is the minimum number of cards I can buy?
questions.answer: Any member interested in enrolling for the XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL CARD program needs to procure a minimum 10 cards.

questions.question: What is the Enrolment Fee?
questions.answer: Enrolment fee depends on the type of XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL CARD. For XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL Cards with one time top ups, the cost of the card is Rs. 60 plus applicable tax and for multiple use the cost is Rs. 100 plus applicable tax. These fees can vary from time to time. Kindly check with our Fleet Marketing Manager for applicable fees at the time of enrolment.

questions.question: How long is the membership valid?
questions.answer: XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL Cards are valid perpetually or till exhaustion of funds allocated to the card.

questions.question: What are the products that I can buy using EASY FUEL?
questions.answer: You can buy all the products and services offered by IndianOil at more than 32000 retail outlets across the country. You can buy Petrol, Diesel, DEF, Lubricants or even RFID / Telematics services offered by us.

questions.question: Can I have multiple card types in one membership?
questions.answer: In your case, you wish to have both Single and Multiple Recharge options for your business needs, please contact our Fleet Marketing Manager, who will render necessary assistance.

questions.question: What are the benefits of becoming a member of the XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL Program?
questions.answer: There are several benefits of becoming an XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL member. XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL Program helps you to provide a right gift which is valued by your customer, without any logistical problems for you. EASY FUEL Card offers you Convenience, saves man hours as there are no hassles of paper vouchers. Cards can be activated or deactivated on a real time basis unlike paper gift vouchers. XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL CARDs can be managed online, safe and secure. To familiarize with the full benefits of the program, please click here.

questions.question: Why is an XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL Gift Card better than any other Gift Card?
questions.answer:
XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL is better than any other bank gift card as the smart chip technology is more secure, can be recharged with value and fit for single and repeated use. XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL also provides you online access to your account to manage the gift cards, block or reactivate a card, generate reports.
For a discerning customer like you, XTRAPOWER EASY FUEL CARD Program offers you total control and makes your customers happy. For more details please click here to know more.

questions.question: How do I edit my profile details?
questions.answer: You would be able to update only Email by yourself. Should you need to update any other profile parameters, kindly get in touch with your Fleet Marketing Manager or simply create a service ticket.

questions.question: How do I update my Email?
questions.answer: You can easily update your email id by logging into your account in the web portal. The email id will be verified along with a mobile OTP sent to the registered mobile number. If you need further guidance, you can check this Support Article.

questions.question: How do I update my Mobile number?
questions.answer: You need to create a service ticket for updating mobile number by attaching documentary proof. The new mobile number will be updated by us after due verification.

questions.question: How do I update my PAN / GST?
questions.answer: You need to create a service ticket by attaching a copy of PAN / GST documentary proof. PAN / GST will be updated by us after due verification.

questions.question: How do I update my address details?
questions.answer: You need to create a service ticket by attaching documentary proof for your new address. We will update your new address after due verification.

questions.question: Who is a Key Official?
questions.answer: Key Official is the primary person responsible for the Account Membership.

questions.question: How do I update Key Official details?
questions.answer: Please create a service ticket by attaching documentary proof and authorization letter. We will update Key Official details after due verification.

questions.question: What are the various SMS alerts that I can get?
questions.answer: Multiple types of alerts like Event based, Daily Summary are available. These SMS Alerts are highly configurable where you can choose Alerts which are desired by you. To know more, you can check this Support Article.

questions.question: Can I query my account through SMS?
questions.answer: Yes, you can easily send your query from the registered mobile number for getting desired information. To see the syntax, please click here.

questions.question: Can I get SMS alerts for transactions to multiple team members?
questions.answer: Yes. You can choose transactions and mobile numbers for sending SMS alerts. For example, for one transaction, you can map three mobile numbers at admin level and one mobile number at Driver / Cardholder level for SMS alerts. This will help you to get four SMS alerts for a single transaction with alert content appropriate to the end user. This can be configured easily by you in the SMS Alert Registration page. For further help, please click here for a detailed support article.

questions.question: Can I get additional login credentials with view only access?
questions.answer: Yes. You can get additional login credentials with desired permissions. Please create a service ticket to enable us to address your needs.

questions.question: Can I get API integration facility?
questions.answer: API integrations are available for large fleet operations having adequate technology infrastructure. Please contact your Fleet Marketing Manager or mail us with your requirements for further evaluations.

questions.question: How can I close my Account?
questions.answer: You can close your Account any time with or without cause / reasons and without any liability on the part of Indian Oil Corporation Limited of whatsoever nature, in which case, you will have to notify Indian Oil Corporation Limited of the closure. The Card / Account should not be used thereafter. You will however remain liable for all charges incurred and due on the Card till the date of such closure/cancellation of Card. All the Cards shall be deactivated and surrendered to IOCL. IOCL shall refund money available in CCMS Account after adjusting receivables, if any. No interest charges or any charges for delay in refund settlement shall be payable by IOCL.

questions.question: What if my account is not operated?
questions.answer: In case you have not used your Account (i.e. Nil financial transactions for purchase of fuel) continuously for three years, your account will be closed suo moto by IOCL without any further communication to you. Loyalty points, if any, will lapse immediately. If there are any funds available, the same shall be refunded to you upon lodging a proper claim by you and only after thorough scrutiny of the Account. No interest charges or any charges for delay in refund settlement shall be payable by IOCL.

questions.question: How do I recharge my account?
questions.answer: You can recharge your CCMS Account through multiple modes like RTGS, NEFT, IMPS, UPI, Cheque deposit at select branches, Online Fund Transfer from your internet banking account, Online Payment Gateway Recharges through our web portal/app and Cash deposit at Micro ATMs at IOCL outlets.

questions.question: What is a CCMS Account?
questions.answer: CCMS stands for Centralized Cash Management System. Each Customer ID has a CCMS Account, which is similar to a bank account.

questions.question: What is CCMS Recharge?
questions.answer: CCMS Recharge is a transaction type which credits your CCMS Account.

questions.question: Can I do RTGS / NEFT / Fund transfer from the bank or my internet banking account?
questions.answer: Yes. You need to register your Virtual Account as a Beneficiary and can transfer funds from your login in your internet bank account.

questions.question: What is a Virtual Account Number?
questions.answer: A Virtual Account Number is created by us for each Customer ID to enable you to do fund transfer through RTGS / NEFT / IMPS / UPI / Cheque deposit.

questions.question: What is my Virtual Account Number?
questions.answer:
Your Virtual Account Number is a 16 digit alphanumeric number starting with IOCLXP followed by your 10 digit customer id. For example, if your 10 digit Customer ID is XXXXXXXXXX, then your Virtual Account number will be IOCLXPXXXXXXXXXX. The complete details are given below:
Virtual Account Number (16 Digit Alphanumeric) IOCLXPXXXXXXXXXX XXXXXXXXXX is the 10 digits of your Customer Id
Beneficiary NameIndian Oil Corporation Limited
IFSC CodeHDFC0000240
Bank NameHDFC Branch
BranchHDFC Sandoz Branch, Worli, Mumbai

questions.question: Do I have to transfer funds to individual cards or my central account?
questions.answer: Recharge is made to the CCMS Account, subsequently you can either allocate funds or set limits for individual cards.

questions.question: Will I be able to transfer funds 24 X 7?
questions.answer: Yes. You can recharge your account 24 X 7 through various recharge modes available to you.

questions.question: What are the online recharge options?
questions.answer: We have integrated Online Payment Gateways of HDFC, SBIePay, Razorpay and Paytm at present and many more on the anvil. These recharge methods are ideally suited for small value amounts as there are chances of failure at multiple levels owing to your funds getting stuck sometimes. We would always recommend fund transfers through RTGS / NEFT wherever the amount to be recharged is significantly high, as this is more reliable.

questions.question: Why do you charge convenience fees for online recharges?
questions.answer: Convenience fees are collected by online payment gateways during online recharges. IndianOil absorbs charges towards certain instrument types in line with prevailing government directives. You can save your costs by doing a fund transfer from your internet bank account or using RTGS / NEFT / IMPS from your bank.

questions.question: Can I deposit cash for recharging my account?
questions.answer: Yes. You would be able to deposit cash at select IndianOil Retail Outlets acting as a Banking Correspondent and having Micro ATMs. Cash deposit shall be subject to KYC and / limits applied by Micro ATM / Banking partner.

questions.question: How long does it take to get the credit in IOCL?
questions.answer: While recharges through RTGS / NEFT / IMPS / UPI credits your account within 3 hours, the Online Payment Gateway recharges offer instant credit on most occasions.

questions.question: My online payment gateway recharge is showing as Pending. What should I do?
questions.answer: If we do not receive any confirmation from your bank for an online recharge transaction, the transaction is kept in pending status. We would query your bank online and the status would be updated within the next day.

questions.question: My bank account is debited, but the XTRAPOWER account is not credited. What should I do?
questions.answer: In case your account is debited for an online recharge transaction, but did not get the credit in XTRAPOWER, kindly create a service ticket. We would coordinate with your bank for early refunds wherever applicable.

questions.question: If my recharge failed will I get refunds?
questions.answer: Yes, in case we receive funds from your bank for a failed transaction, we would refund on the next working day.

questions.question: How long does it take to get the refunds for failed recharges?
questions.answer: In case we receive funds from your bank for a failed transaction, we would refund on the next working day. However, your bank might provide you credit within 4 to 5 working days.

questions.question: How do I make a complaint for failed recharges?
questions.answer: In case your account is debited for an online recharge transaction, but did not get the credit in XTRAPOWER, kindly create a service ticket. We would coordinate with your bank for early refunds wherever applicable.

questions.question: When I tried to transfer funds through RTGS / NEFT / IMPS, IOCL account did not recharge, but funds were returned. What should I do?
questions.answer: Return of funds to your source account can happen sometimes especially when you are starting the operation, though it is a rare occurrence. You need to raise a service ticket or contact Fleet Marketing Manager to enable us to take it up with the Bank for resolution.

questions.question: I have recharged wrongly to some other customer id. How to get funds credited in my account?
questions.answer: In case you have recharged a wrong customer id by mistake, kindly obtain a letter from your bank in their letter head providing the Debit Account Number & Name, Amount, Date of Transaction, UTR Reference, Beneficiary Account Number (Wrong Customer ID) and send us a mail or create a service ticket. We would verify this and reverse the transaction subject to availability of funds.

questions.question: Who is a Credit Partner?
questions.answer: Credit Partners are typically Banks or NBFCs with whom IndianOil has already tied up for providing credit facility to you for fuel purchases. Please note that the credit facility is subject to the terms and conditions of our Credit Partner, which may be revised, from time to time without notice or may even be withdrawn.

questions.question: How many credit partners do you have?
questions.answer: IndianOil at present has tie ups with Sundaram Finance, Amex, HDFC Bank, Shriram Transport Finance, Tata Motors Finance, Mahindra Finance, Hinduja Leyland Finance for providing credit facility for buying fuel. IndianOil is also trying to add more numbers to this list to help you choose from a wider option.

questions.question: How do I apply for a credit facility on a card?
questions.answer: Based on the overall credit limit approved by a credit partner to a card member, each of the Card is given a Daily Credit Limit, which can be used for making purchases of fuel/lubes. The Daily Credit Limit on the Card automatically gets reset at midnight (00:00 hours). You also have the option of using the credit limit to recharge your pre-paid account.

questions.question: How do I use the credit facility?
questions.answer: You can utilize the credit facility in two ways â€“ either use the daily credit limit on the card directly for purchase of fuel at Indian Oil outlets or use the credit limit to recharge your pre-paid account.

questions.question: Can I combine credit & prepaid facilities on a card?
questions.answer: Yes, you can combine the two facilities in a single card. In fact, this helps you to seamlessly purchase fuel depending on your cash flow and financial needs.

questions.question: Can I enroll for prepaid XTRAPOWER cards if my credit application is not approved?
questions.answer: Yes, you can still apply for prepaid XTRAPOWER cards, if the credit partner rejects your application for credit facility.

questions.question: What are the charges to be borne for using the credit option?
questions.answer: The credit variant of the Card has two options: Interest bearing credit and Interest free credit. In case of interest free credit no interest charges would be payable by the card member for credit utilization for a specific period. In case of interest bearing credit, finance charges (as decided by the credit partner) would be payable by the card member for the utilized credit. Reward points would not be given on card usage under interest free credit option whereas rewards points would be offered under interest bearing credit option.

questions.question: How to make payments to Credit Partners?
questions.answer: The credit partner shall periodically raise bills towards credit utilization/ charges. You shall settle all such payments directly with the credit partner.

questions.question: Can one opt for a credit option at a later stage?
questions.answer: You can apply for credit at any stage to any of the credit partners.

questions.question: Do I earn loyalty points if I use a credit facility from a Credit Partner?
questions.answer: Yes. You will get loyalty points for some variants offered by Credit Partner where interest is not borne / subsidized by us.

questions.question: What is Dealer Credit?
questions.answer: Besides our Credit Partners, some of our Retail Outlet Dealers also offer credit facilities to enable you to buy fuel at their outlets. Kindly note that the extension of any credit is the sole discretion of the Retail Outlet Dealers without any commitment or liability on IOCL.

questions.question: How do I avail Dealer Credits?
questions.answer: You need to get in touch with Retail Outlet Dealer directly for negotiating the commercial terms. Click here to search the Retail Outlet locations to identify the best possible locations for fuelling.

questions.question: I am already availing a credit facility from the Dealer. Can I link my XTRAPOWER account with a Dealer credit facility?
questions.answer: You need to share your XTRAPOWER Customer ID to the Dealer so that the Dealer can link you for his Credit facility.

questions.question: How does the Dealer Credit facility work?
questions.answer: XTRAPOWER system enables a Dealer to maintain and monitor the credit limit for each Customer. Once the Dealer is agreeable to provide a credit facility for you, he would create a credit limit in the portal. You would be able to purchase fuels using the Dealer credit limit and record those transactions as and when it occurs.

questions.question: How do I make payment settlements to the Dealer using XTRAPOWER?
questions.answer: All the transactions recorded utilizing the Dealer Credit need to be squared off by making a payment settlement as per the agreed date between you and the Dealer. You can recharge your account to the desired amount and set a Withdrawal Limit for the Dealer to enable payment settlement. For further support, read Support Article.

questions.question: Will I get any statement for credit utilization?
questions.answer: XTRAPOWER Web Portal has complete visibility for you regarding the transactions done using Dealer Credit facility. You can easily track each transaction and know the status (payment settled / yet to be settled) for any time period. Besides this, the Dealer may also be providing you a separate credit settlement request directly to you.

questions.question: Do I earn loyalty points if I use a credit facility from a Credit Partner?
questions.answer: Yes. You will get loyalty points even if you avail a credit facility from the Dealer.

questions.question: What is the insurance coverage available?
questions.answer:
The sum assured under insurance coverage available for the card members is given below:
  • Card member: Rs.50000/- per active card, up to a maximum of Rs. 20 lacs
  • Driver: Rs.1,00,000/- per card
  • Helper: Rs.50,000/- per card
  • Designating a person for insurance benefits in case of partnership firms & companies is mandatory.
  • The insurance coverage would be available as per the prevailing IRDA guidelines during the relevant period.
  • Only ACTIVE CARDS as on date of accident would be entitled for availing insurance benefits
  • Cards with sales transactions of at least Rs.10000/-in last 90 days (prior to the date of accident) would be treated as Active Card.
  • Name as on Card and the one as per RC book of the vehicle should be the same for qualifying for Insurance benefits.
**IndianOil may at any time (in it's sole discretion and without giving any notice thereof to the Card holder or assigning any reason thereof) alter, suspend, withdraw or cancel the benefit of such insurance covered, and there will be no binding obligation on IndianOil to continue this benefit.

questions.question: Do I receive a separate insurance policy schedule for me and my truck crew?
questions.answer: No separate insurance policy is required. Your Fleet Cards would be your reference for any insurance- related claims. For partnership firms & companies, the insurance cover will be available subject to unique and valid nomination during the filling up of application form.

questions.question: What are the eventualities covered?
questions.answer: Death, Permanent Total Disability and Partial permanent disability arising out of the enrolled vehicle involved in a road accident for Drivers and helpers. For Fleet Owners, covered loss arising out of any vehicular road accident shall be applicable. Please click to download the complete information.

questions.question: Is insurance available for accidental insurance?
questions.answer: Yes, for injuries arising out of Vehicular road accidents, Medical Insurance for Drivers and Helpers is available up to a limit of Rs 10000/- per card for a year.

questions.question: Do I need to pay any premium for insurance?
questions.answer: No. You need not pay any premium for insurance for coverage under XTRAPOWER.

questions.question: Is insurance name specific or card specific?
questions.answer: For Members, the insurance is Name Specific and for Truck Crew, it is name on card and RC Book should be the same.

questions.question: Are Generic / Corporate cards covered under insurance?
questions.answer: Members using Generic Cards can avail Insurance for their truck crew provided their Vehicle Numbers are mapped in XTRAPOWER. Please contact your Fleet Marketing Manager for mapping vehicles in the system to enable you to provide insurance coverage for your truck crew.

questions.question: How to claim insurance?
questions.answer:
For lodging any claim the card member should obtain a claim from the website and submit his claim to the following address along with necessary documents:The Oriental Insurance Company Limited
M.C.D.O. 16, Magnet House
4th Floor, N.M.Marg, Ballard Estate
Mumbai 400 001
Tel 022-2261-9241/5154
Fax 022-2261-9243
Email : 111700@orientalinsurance.co.in
Click to download Claim Form

questions.question: What are the documents to be submitted for an insurance claim?
questions.answer:
Personal Accident Insurance Claim:Claim form duly signed by Fleet Owner.
Card number and copy of the card.
Certified copy of FIR obtained in the Printed format of the Police Station.
Hospital's certificate with details of injury, treatment, admission and discharge date.
Copy of Panchnama.
Post Mortem report (In case of any fatal accident)
X-Ray report and other reports if any.
Name of the Legal Heir in whose favor claim settlement is required

questions.question: How can I change the nominee details?
questions.answer: You can change the nominee any time. Kindly create a service ticket and upload documentary evidence to enable us to effect the change.

questions.question: If the claim settlement is delayed, how do I follow up?
questions.answer: Please raise a service ticket by providing complete details including scan copies of documents submitted to the Insurance company directly to enable us to take it up with the Insurance company.

questions.question: How do I enroll for an XTRAPOWER fleet card?
questions.answer: You can easily become a Member and get fleet cards in this link.

questions.question: Is XTRAPOWER Card chip based?
questions.answer: All your XTRAPOWER Cards are chip based since inception and offer very high financial security and transaction integrity unlike magstripe cards offered by some players in the market.

questions.question: What is the minimum number of vehicles for enrolment for XTRAPOWER Fleet Card?
questions.answer: You need to own atleast one commercial vehicle in your name to be eligible for enrolment.

questions.question: Can I enroll attached vehicles?
questions.answer: Yes. You can enroll attached Vehicles. However, you need to provide relevant documentation to support the attached Vehicles are under your control.

questions.question: What is the Enrolment Fee?
questions.answer: Enrolment Fee is Rs. 100 plus taxes per Card. At present, Enrolment Fee is waived off. Please get in touch with our Fleet Marketing Officer to know more on prevailing charges at the time of enrolment.

questions.question: Can I add / remove vehicles enrolled?
questions.answer: Yes. You can add or remove vehicles enrolled whenever you need.

questions.question: How do I avail additional Cards?
questions.answer: You can get additional Cards whenever you add vehicles. Kindly contact our Fleet Marketing Manager and provide necessary documents to enable us to create additional Cards.

questions.question: Are you issuing physical and digital Cards?
questions.answer: Cards are issued in physical form. Digital cards are available on specific requests. However, all Cards can transact through physical, digital or RFID transaction modes. For more information, please read our support article on Transaction Modes.

questions.question: How long will it take to get physical Cards?
questions.answer: Upon approval, Cards will be delivered to you within 10 working days.

questions.question: What is the validity of the Cards?
questions.answer: The XTRAPOWER Cards are perpetually valid and no renewal is necessary.

questions.question: Can I get instant / over the counter Cards?
questions.answer: We do issue OTC Cards which can be used instantly and available across the table for emergency needs. Please contact our Fleet Marketing Manager to receive OTC Cards for your needs.

questions.question: Can I use the card instantly upon creation?
questions.answer: Digital Cards can be used instantly upon creation. In such cases, no physical cards would be delivered. However, if you want to have physical cards also, there could be a delay of upto 24 hours from the time of card creation before you can start using. Kindly contact our Fleet Marketing Manager for specific issues to enable us to help you.

questions.question: How do I hotlist a lost Card?
questions.answer: You can easily hotlist through SMS / Web Portal / Mobile App or by calling 24 X 7 Help Desk.

questions.question: I have found a card which was lost earlier, Can I reuse the card?
questions.answer: A hotlisted card can be reactivated on receipt of a written request from you. On acceptance of the request the hotlisted card can be reactivated subject to the card not having been permanently hotlisted. Only temporarily hotlisted cards can be reactivated. Reactivation would be done within 48 hours.

questions.question: How do I get my card reissued?
questions.answer: In case you have lost your Card and wish to get it reissued, please create a service ticket to enable us to address your issue quickly.

questions.question: How will I get a replacement Card against a lost or damaged Card?
questions.answer: A replacement card can be issued to the card member after due verification and payment of replacement card fee @Rs. 100 per card. The pre-paid amount balance on the lost card if any, shall be transferred to the customer CCMS account after due verification.

questions.question: What is transaction mode?
questions.answer: Transaction Mode is a flexible feature available only with XTRAPOWER. Under this, you can choose either Card or Mobile or RFID as the transaction mode for using your Card. At any point of time, only transaction mode is available for a Card Number. In case, an incorrect transaction mode is used at the retail outlet for purchase of fuel, the transaction would be declined. To know more about the Transaction Mode, please see our support article on Transaction Modes.

questions.question: How do I change transaction mode?
questions.answer: You can easily change the Transaction Mode in your login in the web portal. To know more about the Transaction Mode, please see our support article on Transaction Modes.

questions.question: After receiving the Card, how do I activate the Cards?
questions.answer: There is no need to activate the Cards as the Cards would be delivered in Active status only. You need to set PIN and set limits to suit your business requirements to enable the cards to transact.

questions.question: How do I set PIN?
questions.answer: During the first transaction, the Point of Sale Terminal will prompt the User to set the PIN of his choice without which transaction will not proceed. You can also conveniently set PIN online in our web portal or mobile app.

questions.question: How do I change my PIN later?
questions.answer: You can change the PIN any time in our web portal or mobile app.

questions.question: What if my driver forgets the PIN?
questions.answer: In case, your Driver forgets the PIN, you can reset the PIN online in a web portal or mobile app. Or the Cardâ€™s PIN has to be blocked by entering the wrong PIN three times, get it blocked and then you can Unblock (for older versions of cards).

questions.question: What is PIN unblock?
questions.answer:
In case there is an attempt to use a Card with a wrong PIN for more than 3 times, the Cardâ€™s PIN is blocked for security reasons.
You need to unblock PIN either by sending SMS from the registered mobile number or in a mobile app or in a web portal. After unblocking the PIN as above, the Card needs to be presented to the Point of Sale Terminal at the petrol pump and do PIN Unblock transaction. Once this is successfully done, User will be prompted to set a new PIN.

questions.question: Can my Driver get an SMS alert?
questions.answer: Yes. You need to map your Driverâ€™s mobile number for each Card and register for SMS alerts. For more help, please read our support article on SMS Alert Registrations.

questions.question: Can I get SMS alerts to various users on any event on Card?
questions.answer: Yes. You can choose transactions and mobile numbers for sending SMS alerts. For example, for one transaction, you can map three mobile numbers at admin level and one mobile number at Driver / Cardholder level for SMS alerts. This will help you to get four SMS alerts for a single transaction with alert content appropriate to the end user. This can be configured easily by you in the SMS Alert Registration page. For further help, please click here for a detailed support article .

questions.question: What are the limits?
questions.answer: Limits are defined by you for every Card so that the Cards can transact only within the defined limits, irrespective of any amount of money you have in your account.

questions.question: What types of limits are available?
questions.answer:
Multiple types of limits are available.
Sale Transaction Limit:Limit for a single transaction.
Daily Sale Limit:Daily limit, beyond which transaction would decline
Daily Credit Limit:Daily credit limit set by Credit Partner
Cash Purse Limit:Maximum limit each Card can have in its own wallet.
Monthly Sale Limit:Monthly limit, beyond which transaction would decline
CCMS Limit Type:One Time, Daily and Unlimited types are available
CCMS Limit:This is the limit amount against the CCMS Limit Type

To know more about setting limits and which limit will be appropriate for you, please read our Support Article on Limit Management.

questions.question: Can I update card limits through excel upload?
questions.answer: Yes. You can easily update limits for Cards using bulk upload through excel facility.

questions.question: Can I know who has modified limits?
questions.answer: Yes. You can know who has modified limits and when in Audit Trails for the last 15 days. For knowing any data for older periods, kindly send us a mail or generate a service ticket.

questions.question: Can I specify products that can be purchased on a Card?
questions.answer: Yes. You can edit the products that can be purchased on a Card in your login in web portal under Customer ðŸ¡ª Cards. By default, Diesel and Lubricants would be enabled.

questions.question: Is there any maximum limit on purchase of a product on a particular day?
questions.answer:
There are different limits for each card, which can be set by the card member himself up to a ceiling.
Sale Transaction Limit - It is the maximum value of a single sale transaction on a card (default value Rs. 12000/-).
Daily Limit - It is the maximum value of sale transactions that can be undertaken on a card in a day (default value Rs.24000/-) and
Daily Credit limitIt is the maximum value of sales transactions that can be undertaken on a card in a day. The limit is fixed by the credit partner.
Monthly limit - It is the maximum value of sales transaction that can be undertaken on a card in a month (default value : Rs. 70,000/-)
Cash Purse Limit - It is the maximum value of cash that can be held in the e-purse of the card at any point of time (Max value Rs. 50,000/-).

questions.question: Can I restrict where my cards must work?
questions.answer: Yes. You can easily restrict Merchants / Retail Outlets where your any or all Cards must work in our web portal. You need to simply choose the Card Number and Merchant ID and allow or restrict to activate this feature. For more help, please read our support article on Merchant Restrictions.

questions.question: What is the need for updating mobile number against a Card?
questions.answer: Updating a unique mobile number against a Card helps to send SMS alerts to the cardholder besides sending alerts to you. In addition, you can choose mobile as a transaction mode only when you have a mapped unique mobile number against a Card.

questions.question: How do I add a mobile number against a Card?
questions.answer: Please go to Customer ðŸ¡ª Cards ðŸ¡ª Choose Transaction Mode and Add Mobile Number for each Card. Please note that the mobile number must be unique for each Card.

questions.question: Can I do transactions through mobile ?
questions.answer: Yes. All cards can transact virtually also. You need to add a unique mobile number and set a PIN as an expiry for changing the transaction mode from Card to Mobile.

questions.question: How secure is Virtual / Card less transaction?
questions.answer: Security is an important consideration when you do Cardless transactions. Hence only with IndianOil you will see a two factor authentication being done (PIN + OTP) besides implementing an configurable validity period to ensure that all your transactions are secure and done by the intended user only. Some other solutions offered by other companies having only OTP based transactions are less secure.

questions.question: What are the Doâ€™s and Donâ€™ts of Virtual / Card less transactions?
questions.answer:
DOâ€™s
  • Set Virtual PIN uniquely for each Card to enhance security.
  • Virtual PIN to be remembered by the Authorized Person for better security. IOCL will not share VIRTUAL PIN on Call/SMS/email to anyone.
  • Set Expiry period of only up to the actual time required. For example, if the fuelling is likely to be done within a day, set Expiry as 1 day for better risk management.
  • In case, the fuelling is completed for the intended value through virtual sales, change the transaction mode to Card or simply reset the PIN to prevent any further use.
  • Hotlist the Card immediately or change the transaction mode from Mobile to Card if the mobile phone of the User is stolen / misplaced.


DONâ€™Ts
  • Do not share your login id to anyone.
  • Do not share Virtual PIN through SMS to the same mobile number associated with the Card.
  • Do not write down the Virtual PIN.
  • Do not set Virtual PIN that can be easily guessed- like Vehicle Number, 1234, 1111 etc.

questions.question: Can one use one card for more than one vehicle?
questions.answer: No. Usage of a Card for other / All vehicles are not permitted. Such transactions will lead to blockage of Card and loyalty point redemptions.

questions.question: What if I lose the Card?
questions.answer: If you lose a Card, you can easily hotlist through SMS / Web Portal / Mobile App or by calling 24 X 7 Help Desk. The card would be deactivated instantly for any future transactions.

questions.question: What is Cash Sales, CCMS Sales, CCMS Auth and Credit Sales?
questions.answer:
These are various transaction types available in XTRAPOWER to provide you flexibility in operations while purchasing fuel in multiple arrangements.
Cash Sales: This debits the wallet associated with individual Card.
CCMS Sales: This debits the CCMS Account.
CCMS Auth: This is just a record of the transaction when you are under Dealer Credit. No debits are posted.
Credit Sales: This consumes your Daily Credit Limit when you utilize the credit limit from Credit Partners.

questions.question: Can I capture the vehicle's actual odometer reading at the time of fueling?
questions.answer: Yes. This is one of the important benefits of our program. Your Driver needs to provide the actual odometer reading at the time of fueling. This information is captured and is available to you in real time for effective monitoring of vehicle mileage.

questions.question: Can I get SMS Alerts for Transactions?
questions.answer: You can get SMS alerts for all transactions. You need to register for SMS alerts to be able to get the alerts.

questions.question: Can Alerts be sent to multiple users for any transaction?
questions.answer: Yes. You can get SMS alerts to multiple mobile numbers / Users for all transactions. The SMS is delivered with slightly different content to ensure that critical information is given only to you whereas general transaction details can be given to other Users as well. These SMS alerts can be configured by you in our portal or mobile app. For more help, please read our support article on SMS Alert Registrations.

questions.question: How do I monitor transactions on a real time basis?
questions.answer: You can monitor all the transactions in real time in a web portal or mobile app. All transactions reflect immediately for you so that you can exercise effective control of your fueling operations.

questions.question: What is UT and PT Status?
questions.answer:
UT stands for Unprocessed Transaction. This is the temporary status of the transaction the moment the transaction is authorized in Server. This is not the final status and can be cancelled or rolled back upon settlement.
PT stands for Processed Transaction. This is the final status of the transaction. Once the status is turned to PT, the transaction is not cancelled or rolled back.

questions.question: My transaction is in UT status? What should I do?
questions.answer: Transactions are in UT status once authorized. The status automatically changes to PT upon batch settlement by the Dealer. In case, the transaction is not successful at the POS Terminal, such UT transactions will automatically get rolled back / reversed. Your limits and funds in your account will be restored if there is any such rollback.

questions.question: I got an SMS but the charge slip was not printed in the POS Terminal. What should I do?
questions.answer: Printing of charge slip is a confirmation that POS Terminal received the transaction successfully. In case, you got an SMS showing debits in your account, but charge slip is not printed in the POS Terminal, such transaction will automatically get rolled back / reversed. Your limits and funds in your account will be restored if there is any such rollback.

questions.question: Will I get any Statement?
questions.answer: You can download your statement from Customer ðŸ¡ª Financials ðŸ¡ª XTRAPOWER Statement. Please note that the Statement is based on PT transaction status only. UT transactions will not reflect owing to discrepancy if possible. Such UT transactions if turned into PT subsequently will be included in the next month Statement.

questions.question: Can I change my Statement Period?
questions.answer: Yes. You can change the statement period to any 30/31 days period to suit your business needs. Kindly create a service ticket to enable us to address your requirement.

questions.question: Will I get any Reports?
questions.answer: You have access to extensive reports and alerts. Please reach out to us in case you need any specific assistance or daily automated alerts to specific email ids.

questions.question: I am noticing a discrepancy in Transaction, what should I do?
questions.answer: In case you notice any discrepancy in a transaction, you need to bring to our notice within 7 days of such occurrence for our investigation. You can also create a service ticket giving details to enable us to investigate and address your issue promptly.

questions.question: Can I get a Closing / Balance Certificate to submit to my audit department?
questions.answer: Yes. You can get help for specific needs like this. Kindly contact your Fleet Marketing Manager or mail us or simply create a service ticket to enable us to address your requirement.

questions.question: How can I restrict outlets where my cards must work?
questions.answer: You can easily restrict Merchants / Retail Outlets where your any or all Cards must work in our web portal. You need to simply choose the Card Number and Merchant ID and allow or restrict to activate this feature. For more help, please read our support article on Merchant Restrictions.

questions.question: My card is not working / transaction declined?
questions.answer: In case, your card is declined at our outlet, you need to check if CCMS Balance is available, limits are available for the Card, product and outlet transacting is allowed for the Card.  In case you are still not able to troubleshoot, please contact our 24 X 7 Toll Free Helpdesk.

questions.question: How do I login to the portal for the first time?
questions.answer: You can login in a web portal or mobile app conveniently. You have the option to change your system generated User Name to your desired Username on one time basis in the Register New User link during the first time login.

questions.question: What to do if my username gets locked?
questions.answer: As a security feature, UserID gets locked if there are six wrong attempts to login with an incorrect password. You can unlock the User ID simply by sending an SMS (UNLOCK <UserID> from your registered mobile number to 9223011099 or call our Toll Free Help Desk 1800 200 1214.

questions.question: Can I get additional login ids for different users?
questions.answer: Yes, you can add additional login ids for your team members. Kindly create a service ticket providing the email and mobile number of the additional user to enable us to create additional login as desired.

questions.question: Can I restrict permissions for different users?
questions.answer: The permissions are restricted for additional users as primarily only viewing rights are given and sensitive features will be available only in your login. In case you wish to provide more rights, kindly create a service ticket providing the right required to enable us to evaluate the feasibility and address your need.

questions.question: How do I disable a user id created for my staff?
questions.answer: You can disable an User ID created for your staff any time. Drop us a mail or create a service ticket to enable us to block it immediately.

questions.question: Can I get guidance for understanding all the features in the web portal?
questions.answer: Yes. You can browse our Support Articles to familiarize yourself with the various features. In case you need any further support or hands on training, kindly contact our Fleet Marketing Manager.

questions.question: Do you have mobile apps for Android and iOS?
questions.answer: Yes. We have mobile apps for Android and iOS. Click on the link to download Android App or iOS App.

questions.question: What to do if my username gets locked?
questions.answer: As a security feature, UserID gets locked if there are six wrong attempts to login with an incorrect password. You can unlock the User ID simply by sending an SMS (UNLOCK <UserID> from your registered mobile number to 9223011099 or call our Toll Free Help Desk 1800 200 1214.

questions.question: I am facing a specific issue with the mobile app, how can I seek support?
questions.answer: If you unfortunately face any issue in our mobile apps, kindly share a screenshot with us giving details. You can share the screenshot and issue by mail or by creating a service ticket to enable us to fix the issue.

questions.question: Can I raise a service ticket from a mobile app?
questions.answer: Yes. You can easily chat with our helpdesk team and raise a service ticket should you face any issue.

questions.question: What is XTRAPOWER Telematics?
questions.answer: XTRAPOWER Telematics is the only integrated solution in India combining the power of Fleet Cards and Telematics technologies. This facilitates combining data streams from different sources and enables you to manage your fuel and fleet management very easily and save on costs.

questions.question: How can I enroll for Telematics services?
questions.answer: You can easily enroll the Vehicles online in the web portal in your login. Upon approval of the offered vehicles and completion of payment, installation of devices would be arranged.

questions.question: How many vehicles should I enroll minimum?
questions.answer: You need to offer a minimum of 5 vehicles at a single location.

questions.question: Do I get Telematics automatically once I become a member of XTRAPOWER?
questions.answer: No. You do not become a member of Telematics services automatically. You need to enroll your specified vehicles further into the Telematics services.

questions.question: What are the Telematics device specifications?
questions.answer: The Telematics devices offered by XTRAPOWER are world class with advanced specifications. Click here to see the full specifications.

questions.question: Do you offer AIS-140 devices?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer AIS 140 devices directly or through our network wherever required.

questions.question: Can I integrate other peripherals like fuel sensors, temperature sensors, etc.,?
questions.answer: Yes, you can integrate various peripherals like fuel, temperature, door sensors etc. with the Telematics devices offered by us. Click here to see what all you can integrate.

questions.question: Are there any installation charges?
questions.answer: The installation charges are absorbed by us and completely waived off for you.

questions.question: How long will it take to install devices?
questions.answer: Installation of the devices would depend on vehicle availability. In most occasions, devices are installed within 7 working days.

questions.question: Can you install for my vehicles across the country?
questions.answer: Yes. The biggest advantage when you choose IndianOil is that the device installations can happen across the country. You need to just depend on one supplier instead of multiple small time vendors for servicing your needs.

questions.question: Can my vehicle's telematics devices be serviced across the country?
questions.answer: Yes. This is the biggest advantage for you as any issue with your Telematics devices can be serviced across the country.

questions.question: Can I get multiple user logins to access Telematics features?
questions.answer: Yes, it is possible to have multiple login ids. Kindly contact your Fleet Marketing Manager or create a service ticket to enable us to address your needs.

questions.question: Can I access Telematics features in the Mobile App?
questions.answer: Yes. You would be able to manage your fuel and fleet management in a single mobile app.

questions.question: Can I group vehicles?
questions.answer: Yes. You would be able to create vehicle groups for monitoring fleet at various hierarchies within your organization.

questions.question: What is Geofenced Fueling?
questions.answer: This is a unique facility provided by XTRAPOWER which ensures that your Card will work only when the Vehicle is inside the specified retail outlet.

questions.question: What kind of reports are available?
questions.answer: We have a very flexible and dynamic reporting system. While there are many standard reports like â€“ Daily KM Report, Summary Report, In/ Out Report, Day Wise Report, Halt Report, Idling Report, On/Off Report, Overspeed Report, Tracking Report, Trip Report, Device Pullout Report, Exceptional Reports and many more, you can also easily configure your required fields and create a Custom Report for you. You can also get in touch with us for creating any Custom Report to address your specific requirements.

questions.question: Can I get API Integration?
questions.answer: We can provide a large API stack covering your fuel and Telematics fleet management. To know the exact APIs available to suit your business need, please contact your Fleet Marketing Manager or create a service ticket to address your query.

questions.question: What is your pricing plan?
questions.answer: Our pricing plans are very competitive and offer you the best pricing. We have designed our pricing in such a way that you do not miss out on any features which are critical for your operations. This kind of plan is available only with XTRAPOWER as even a customer offering a few trucks can still fully utilize all the features of our powerful platform.

questions.question: Are there any SMS charges?
questions.answer: Unlike other tracking services in the market which would require you to buy SMS packs, you need not buy any SMS packs in XTRAPOWER Telematics. The SMS services for you are absolutely free.

questions.question: Can I redeem loyalty points for availing Telematics?
questions.answer: Yes. You can redeem your XTRA loyalty points for Telematics services.

questions.question: What is RFID Fuel Management?
questions.answer: RFID stands for Radio Frequency Identification. RFID technology is effectively used in the fueling process by fitting RFID Reader on the Fuel Dispenser and RFID Ring on your Vehicleâ€™s fuel tank.

questions.question: How RFID helps in better control?
questions.answer: We use RFID technology to identify your vehicle and deliver accurate fuel inside your vehicleâ€™s fuel tank. Fuel Dispenser will deliver fuel only when the RFID Ring and RFID Reader are in a specific position.

questions.question: Where are RFID facilities available?
questions.answer: At present RFID based fuelling is available at select Retail Outlets on transport hubs, originating points and important highways. This coverage is continuously being expanded.

questions.question: How is RFID installed?
questions.answer: RFID Ring is installed on the Vehicleâ€™s fuel tank by our Service Provider. To see an image, please visit our Gallery section or please click here.

questions.question: Is RFID Ring only for vehicles?
questions.answer: RFID Rings are primarily meant for Vehicles. In case you need to have RFID based fueling for your DG Sets, a separate type of RFID Tag is available.

questions.question: My Vehicle has double tanks, can I fit two RFID Rings?
questions.answer: Yes. You need to have two RFID Rings fitting on each fuel tank for better control.

questions.question: Can I use RFID for my DG Set / Stationery equipment?
questions.answer: Yes. You can use, however, you will derive better control on fueling only when the fueling happens through a mobile browser fitted with RFID systems.

questions.question: What are the charges for RFID?
questions.answer: At present, the onetime charges for RFID are Rs. 855 per RFID Ring including taxes. However, charges might be different due to various sales promotions in vogue. Kindly contact our Fleet Marketing Manager for better guidance.

questions.question: Can RFID prevent fuel theft?
questions.answer: RFID helps in ensuring that the fuel is delivered from the Fuel Dispenser only to the specified Vehicleâ€™s fuel tank. This ensures that the quantity delivered inside your fuel tank is accurate and fully reliable.

questions.question: What if the RFID ring is broken?
questions.answer: If RFID is broken, you need to procure and install a new RFID Ring.

questions.question: Can I shift fueling between RFID and Card?
questions.answer: Yes. You have the control to shift between multiple transaction modes (i.e) shift from RFID based fuelling to Card based fuelling or vice versa. You can easily toggle this at any point in your login in the web portal. For better guidance, please visit our support article on Transaction Modes.

questions.question: RFID transaction status is showing pending, what should I do?
questions.answer:
In case an attempt is made to fuel your vehicle through RFID, XTRAPOWER system blocks the required limits and funds and authorizes fuel delivery. The transaction would be posted in XTRAPOWER only when the final actual fuel delivery details are received from the retail outlet automation system. For further reading, please visit our support article on RFID Transactions.
Till such time the transaction would be treated as Pending. In case you have any urgent support required for release of limits / funds, kindly contact our Fleet Marketing Manager or create a Service Ticket.

questions.question: I want to integrate my enterprise system with IOCL, can you help?
questions.answer: Yes. We do support B2B API integrations to ensure seamless business operations for you.

questions.question: What are all the various integration methods available?
questions.answer: We support all integration methods (Pull and Push Web APIs in JSON and XML, Webhooks, File exchanges through FTPS / SFTP) to suit individual business needs.

questions.question: What are all the APIs available for integration?
questions.answer: We can provide a large API stack covering your fuel and Telematics fleet management. To know the exact APIs available to suit your business need, please contact our Fleet Marketing Manager or create a service ticket.

questions.question: Can you develop custom APIs for my business requirement?
questions.answer: We already have a large API stack which can be used readily by you. In case, if any of our existing APIs do not meet your needs, we can develop custom APIs to suit your business needs.

questions.question: Can I get a sandbox environment for development?
questions.answer: Yes. We would provide a sandbox environment for testing the integration once you are onboarded for API integration.

questions.question: Whom to contact for API Integration?
questions.answer: For getting onboarded for API Integration, please contact your Fleet Marketing Manager or create a service ticket.

questions.question: Can I know more about API Support?
questions.answer: We are aware that fleet operations cannot stop, come what may. Hence for all customers integrated with us, we have a 24X7 technical support team whose main role is to ensure support for you when you need it the most.

questions.question: What are XTRA Points?
questions.answer: XTRA Points are reward points that a Member earns on his  XTRAPOWER transactions. Reward points are dynamic and are awarded based on specific transaction types and events occurring in your account.

questions.question: When do I start earning XTRA Points?
questions.answer: You will start earning XTRA Points the moment you recharge the account and start sales transactions.

questions.question: How do I know my XTRA Points balance?
questions.answer: You can easily know your XTRA Points balance from the POS Terminal at Retail Outlet or through Website / Mobile App or through sending an SMS or Call / Email Toll Free Help Desk from your registered mobile number / email.

questions.question: If one XTRAPOWER member has more than one vehicle in the program, will the XTRA Points accumulate against individual cards / vehicles or collectively?
questions.answer: All XTRA Points are aggregated at the Customer Account. These XTRA Points can only be redeemed by the Member himself and not by the individual Cardholders / Drivers.

questions.question: Do I get any XTRA points for Easy Fuel?
questions.answer: You get the loyalty awarded as a cashback directly into your account for Easy Fuel accounts.

questions.question: Do I get XTRA points if I avail credit facility?
questions.answer: Yes. If you avail credit facility from dealers, you will be awarded loyalty points at the time of credit settlements. Besides, you will get loyalty points for specific types of credit facility from some credit partners.

questions.question: What is the validity period of XTRA Points?
questions.answer: XTRA Points earned by a Member Is valid for 5 financial years. All XTRA Points remaining unredeemed after such periods shall lapse.

questions.question: When can I redeem XTRA Points?
questions.answer: You can redeem XTRA Points after accumulation of a minimum of 80,000 points.

questions.question: How can I redeem XTRA Points?
questions.answer: Redemption is the easiest in the XTRAPOWER program. You can instantly redeem your points from Web Portal or Mobile App or through SMS or by visiting our designated retail outlets.

questions.question: What are all the redemption options available?
questions.answer:
Lot of redemption options are available for you.
You can redeem for free fuel / lubes at retail outlets or even convert the value of your points into money and have it credited in your CCMS account instantly.
You can also place redemption requests for other electronic gift vouchers from leading brands like Amazon, Cleartrip or even convert your loyalty points to Intermiles. The list is dynamic and is updated regularly.

questions.question: Can I redeem XTRA Points for Free Fuel & Lubes?
questions.answer: Yes, the Member can redeem XTRA Points for auto fuel and lubricants at any of the designated retail outlets. The redeemed product has to be collected free of cost instantly at the same retail outlet itself.

questions.question: Can my vehicle drivers redeem XTRA Points?
questions.answer: No, only the Member can redeem XTRA Points.

questions.question: Why is my redemption blocked?
questions.answer: Upon identifying any suspicious activity / transactions the system blocks the loyalty redemption to protect you. If unfortunately you are facing an issue like this, kindly raise a service ticket or contact our Fleet Marketing Manager for resolution.

questions.question: I am unable to redeem for E Gift Vouchers.
questions.answer: Certain customer types are eligible only for select items to redeem in order to protect the loyalty points. If you have any specific issue, kindly raise a service ticket or contact our Fleet Marketing Manager for resolution.

questions.question: I have not received my E Gift Vouchers. What should I do?
questions.answer: E Gift Vouchers are delivered by our partners through Email or Mobile. In case, you are expecting an E-Gift Voucher through email, kindly check your Junk mail too besides your inbox. If you are still facing issues, kindly create a service ticket for resolution.

questions.question: How do I lodge a dispute?
questions.answer:
If you are an existing customer and your issue pertains to XTRAPOWER / EASY FUEL, you can lodge a complaint at 1800 200 1214 or email us at help@iocxtrapower.com or simply create a service ticket.
In case your issue pertains to something other than XTRAPOWER / EASY FUEL program, you can lodge a complaint at https://iocl.com/AboutUs/contacts.aspx.

questions.question: What is the dispute redressal mechanism?
questions.answer: Once you lodge a dispute, your issue will be assigned to our field officer who will be in touch with you to get firsthand information, investigate the problem and provide you a redressal to your satisfaction.

questions.question: How fast will I get a solution for my complaint?
questions.answer: Your issue is of utmost importance to us. We will strive to resolve your issue within 7 working days for most of the cases.

questions.question: How can I escalate my complaint?
questions.answer: In case you feel that your issue is not resolved to your satisfaction, please do write to us at  General Manager (Fleet Marketing), Indian Oil Corporation Limited, G9, Ali Yavar Jung Marg, Bandra East, Mumbai â€“ 400051 for escalating your issue.

questions.question: Can I go to any retail outlet to use the XTRAPOER / EASY FUEL Card?
questions.answer: More than 32,000 retail outlets of IndianOil accept XTRAPOWER and EASY FUEL Cards. This is the largest network in India and your vehicle will never be far from an IndianOil petrol pump.

questions.question: How can I locate retail outlets on a specific location/route?
questions.answer: You can easily search desired outlets on a specific location or a route using our search outlet feature in our website or mobile app. Please click here to search outlets.

questions.question: If I have an issue at a retail outlet, how do I lodge a complaint?
questions.answer:
If you are an existing customer and your issue pertains to XTRAPOWER / EASY FUEL, you can lodge a complaint at 1800 200 1214 or email us at help@iocxtrapower.com or simply create a service ticket.
In case your issue pertains to something other than XTRAPOWER / EASY FUEL program, you can lodge a complaint at https://iocl.com/AboutUs/contacts.aspx.

questions.question: Will IOCL do custom developments to suit my business needs?
questions.answer: Yes. We do understand that fleet operations are unique to every business, hence we are always open to provide a customized solution as per your business needs.

questions.question: I need a specific requirement in your API / web portal for my business, is it possible?
questions.answer: Yes. It is possible. Do get in touch with us giving your detailed requirements. We will endeavor to meet your requirements.

questions.question: I need custom Alert / Report requirements, whom should I contact?
questions.answer: You can contact our Fleet Marketing Manager or Mail us your requirement or simply generate a service ticket

questions.question: Do you have a 24X7 Call center?
questions.answer: Yes. We have a 24X7 Call Center. You can call toll free at 1800 200 1214 or 1800 220 724. You need to call from the registered mobile number to enable us to authenticate yourself and help us service you better for account related queries of existing members.

questions.question: What is the support email id?
questions.answer: You can email your queries to help@iocxtrapower.com. You need to mail us from the same email id as per your account profile to enable us to authenticate yourself and help us service you better for account related queries of existing members.

questions.question: Can the Chat Support resolve my queries?
questions.answer: You can conveniently reach us using the Live Chat Support from a web portal or our mobile app. The Live Chat Support team will make the best efforts to resolve your queries online immediately. If unable to do so, a service ticket would be created to resolve your queries.

questions.question: Do you have any direct Service Centers where I can visit?
questions.answer: Yes. We have Service Centers at important hubs to provide you with personal assistance. To know the details of Service Centers, please click here.

questions.question: How good is your Support System?
questions.answer: We understand that fuel is the lifeline for your business and our Country. We have always stood by the Customers and Country during any emergency situations including natural calamities to localized issues. Our Fleet Marketing Team also ensures that your vehicles are never stranded for fuel whatever be the situation and go beyond the call of duty to serve you. This is the biggest advantage you will see from a brand like IndianOil, which is the most trustworthy and reliable fueling network for many decades.

questions.question: How can I contact IOCL Fleet Marketing Officers?
questions.answer: The details of IOCL Fleet Marketing Officers are available to you under the â€œContact Usâ€ section once you login to our web portal. You can easily contact our team directly, alternately you can just drop a query or even create a service ticket.

questions.question: How do I create a service ticket?
questions.answer: You can easily create a service ticket in your login in web portal under Help Desk ðŸ¡ª Generate Service Ticket link. You can also call our 24 X 7 Toll Free Help Desk to create a service ticket for you.

questions.question: What is the Escalation Matrix if my complaint is not addressed to my satisfaction?
questions.answer: In case you feel that your issue is not resolved to your satisfaction, please do write to us at  General Manager (Fleet Marketing), Indian Oil Corporation Limited, G9, Ali Yavar Jung Marg, Bandra East, Mumbai â€“ 400051 for escalating your issue.

questions.question: What is Fuel @ Call ?
questions.answer: Fuel@Call is an amazing service by IndianOil for delivering Diesel at your doorstep. IndianOil is the pioneer in providing a technology platform for buying fuel for your DG Sets / Stationery Equipment easily. To know more about this please click here.

questions.question: Do I need to have a Fuel @Call Mobile App?
questions.answer: Yes. You need to download Fuel@Call mobile app to be able to avail the services. You can download the mobile app Android App or iOS App.

questions.question: How can I link my Account with Fuel @ Call ?
questions.answer: You can simply link your XTRAPOWER account with Fuel@Call by just entering the Customer ID and authenticating with your credentials.

questions.question: Can I earn XTRA Points on purchases made through Fuel @ Call?
questions.answer: Yes. You get rewarded with loyalty points in XTRAPOWER for all your purchases made through XTRAPOWER in the Fuel@Call app.
